definition: violent crime/to commit a violent act (assault or murder)

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

sentences.english: I wish they would leave us alone and go and arrest some muggers instead.
sentences.chinese: 我希望他们别管我们，去逮捕那些行凶抢劫者。

sentences.english: He plead that he have act in self-defence when he have hit the mugger .
sentences.chinese: 他抗辩道，当他打击行凶抢劫者时他是在自卫。

sentences.english: Where did the mugging take place?
sentences.chinese: 这起行凶抢劫发生在什么地方？

sentences.english: The victim said one assailant hit him with a club.
sentences.chinese: 受害者说，一名行凶者用大头棒打了他。

sentences.english: The police issued an identikit picture of the mugger.
sentences.chinese: 警察印发出其不意行凶抢劫者的形象拼图。

sentences.english: It is reported that perpetrators are Qiandongnan Sansui County, called the dragon years strong.
sentences.chinese: 据悉，行凶者是黔东南州三穗县人，叫龙久烈。

sentences.english: The case of injury in prison is a major hidden danger of the prison mamgement.
sentences.chinese: 狱内行凶伤害案件是监管安全的重大隐患。

sentences.english: It puts you in danger of doing evil to whoever has done evil to you.
sentences.chinese: 它将你引到向作恶者行凶的边缘上去。

sentences.english: And of rainbow father die suddenly, jiang Yu had the suspicion of do violence again.
sentences.chinese: 而彩虹父亲的突然离世，江余又有了行凶的嫌疑。

sentences.english: And bears that have killed a human are more likely to kill again.
sentences.chinese: 而这又杀了人熊更有可能再次行凶。

sentences.english: Other party-goers rescued the injured man from his assailant.
sentences.chinese: 其他参加聚会的人把这名伤者从行凶者手中救了出来。

sentences.english: It said the attacker used a vegetable knife in the slashings.
sentences.chinese: 歹徒在行凶过程中用的是一把菜刀。

sentences.english: Revolutionists are accused of sowing fear abroad. Every barricade seems a crime.
sentences.chinese: 人们责怪革命者散布恐怖，每个街垒好象都在行凶。

sentences.english: This guideline also covers attempted manslaughter and assault with intent to commit manslaughter.
sentences.chinese: 该指导方针也适用于未遂杀人罪和意图杀人而行凶。

sentences.english: There are very bad men in Benjamin.
sentences.chinese: 本杰明那里有些人正在行凶杀人。

sentences.english: Army officials said it was too early to speculate on any motive.
sentences.chinese: 军队官方称，目前推测凶手的行凶动机还为时过早。

definition: to commit a crime or offence
to beat up/to come to blows/battery (law)
to wound with a blade or hatchet/to slash/to gash
to cause trouble/to provoke a dispute
